target.name: checkenv
target.fail:
FLEX_HOME not set
The FLEX_HOME environment variable must be set to the root of a Flex SDK installation (directory containing "bin", "lib", ...)

target.name: build
target.echo: The dashboard application has now been built and is in the "html" directory. To deploy it, copy everything from the "html" directory to the appropriate location on a web server.

target.name: deploy
target.echo:
This ant buildfile does not have an automated "deploy" target. To deploy the dashboard, execute "ant build" (being sure to set the FLEX_HOME environment variable first), and then manually copy the contents of the "html" directory to the appropriate web server location.
You may also optionally modify the contents of the html directory by removing the "data" subdirectory, and editing the "index.html" directory to change the flashvars "config" value to point to the location an alternate location for the dashboard configuration file (for example, http://www.climate.gov/dashboard_mugl/dashboard/flat-dashboard). If you do this, BE SURE to change the "config" value in both of the places where it appears in the file.
